about_the_game:
"I am the storm that is approaching!"

You've sliced and diced through Red Grave City as Dante's twin brother and long-time rival, Vergil, and now you can revel in the auditory glory of his music!

Includes a variety of tunes related to Vergil, as well as V's battle theme, "Crimson Cloud", and Vergil's battle theme, "Bury the Light".

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
